subject: Coaches and Managers
Basketball
Basketball (College)
lead_paragraph: Joanne Boyle will be introduced by Virginia on Monday as the fourth women’s coach in the 38-year history of the program, Athletic Director Craig Littlepage said in a statement Saturday.
snippet: Joanne Boyle will be introduced by Virginia on Monday as the fourth women’s coach in the 38-year history of the program, Athletic Director Craig Littlepage said in a statement Saturday.
